|brand = SeeedStudio |model = NPi i.MX6ULL Dev Board |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = eMMC |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6ULL;MCIMX6Y, 2CVM08AB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- ondocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107 IT:P; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ8081RNB; |eth3chip = Microchip;KSZ8081RNB; |lan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 2 |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04;;, |stockos = Linux;4.19.71;Debian 10
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, I2C, ADC, SPI, GPIO, |addchip = 80mÎ©, Adjustable Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;AeroSemi;MT9700;;2;,,, 2A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2145;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8096;;2;,,, 300mA Transient Response LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9166;;1;,,, 8-bit Serial Shift Register w/3-State Output;NXP;74LV595;;1;,,, Bus Buffer Line Driver w/3-State Output;NXP;74LVC1G125;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu 20.04,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2019 |estprice = 44 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' MCIMX6Y2CVM08AB Single-core Cortex-A7 @800MHz *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Onboard Storage: 8 GiB eMMC, TF card (max. 128GB) / MMC card slot *Network: 2x FE *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1 Type-C Device *GPIO: 1x 40-pin Headers, *Power Source: DC Jack 5V
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/NPi-i.MX6ULL-Dev-Board-Linux-SBC/ ''NPi i.MX6ULL Dev Board Linux SBC'' on '''seeedStudio Wiki'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/hat-compatible-sbc-runs-linux-on-i-mx6-ull/ ''HAT-compatible SBC runs Linux on i.MX6 ULL'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/09/27/npi-i-mx6ull-industrial-linux-sbc/ ''NPi i.MX6ULL (Not So) Industrial-grade Linux SBC'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
